properties.name: yrs-api.version
properties.description: The version of the YourRents API application

properties.name: yrs-api.description
properties.description: A description for for the YourRents API

properties.name: yrs-api.api.version
properties.description: The version of the YourRents API (usually the same as 'yrs-api.version', used in the API endpoints)

properties.name: yrs-api.api.basepath
properties.description: The basepath for the enpoints of the YourRents API

properties.name: yrs-api.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Common separated list of allowed origins for CORS

properties.name: token.converter.principal-attribute
properties.description: The attribute of the token that should be used as the principal
